title: Bulletin of the International Association of Scientific Hydrology
aka: Bulletin de l'Association Internationale d'Hydrologie Scientifique
additional-note: This is a Belgian publication. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US. US subscription prices are mentioned in the front matter of some issues.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Pete Sullivan for copyright research on this title.
